text: The 1986 UCI Track Cycling World Championships were the World Championship for track cycling. They took place in Colorado Springs, United States in 1986.World Championship Track Cycling 2014-1893 Fourteen events were contested, 12 for men (5 for professionals, 7 for amateurs) and 2 for women. ==Medal summary== {| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's professional events |- |Men's keirin |Michel Vaarten || Dieter Giebken || Urs Freuler |- |Men's sprint |Kōichi Nakano || Hideyuki Matsui || Nobuyuki Tawara |- | |Tony Doyle || Hans-Henrik Ørsted || Jesper Worre |- |Men's points race |Urs Freuler || Michel Vaarten || Stefano Allocchio |- |Men's motor-paced | Bruno Vicino || Constant Tourné || Giovanni Renosto |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's amateur events |- | | Maic Malchow || Martin Vinnicombe || Jens Glücklich |- |Men's sprint |Michael Hübner || Lutz Hesslich || Ralf-Guido Kuschy |- | | Viatcheslav Ekimov || Gintautas Umaras || Dean Woods |- |Men's team pursuit | Pavel Soukup Aleš Trčka Svatopluk Buchta Teodor Černý || Steffen Blochwitz Dirk Meier Bernd Dittert Roland Hennig || Viatcheslav Ekimov Alexander Krasnov Viktor Manakov Gintautas Umaras |- |Men's points race |Dan Frost || Olaf Ludwig || Leonard Nitz |- |Men's motor-paced |Mario Gentili || Luigi Bielli || Roland Königshofer |- |Men's tandem | Vítězslav Vobořil Roman Řehounek || Kit Kyle David Lindsey|| Andrea Faccini Roberto Nicotti |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Women's events |- |Women's sprint |Christa Rothenburger |Erika Salumäe |Connie Paraskevin |- |Women's individual pursuit |Jeannie Longo |Rebecca Twigg |Barbara Ganz |} ==Medal table== ==References== Track cycling Category:UCI Track Cycling World Championships by year Category:International cycle races hosted by the United States Category:1986 in track cycling
title: 1986 UCI Track Cycling World Championships
